abstract: India’s Adani Power has refiled a preliminary draft prospectus with the country’s market regulator for an initial public offering, a company spokesperson told Dow Jones.
lead_paragraph: India’s Adani Power has refiled a preliminary draft prospectus with the country’s market regulator for an initial public offering, a company spokesperson told Dow Jones.

headline.main: India’s Adani Power Eyes I.P.O. Again

abstract: The recent financial crisis has heightened the need for fundamental changes in the Dow Jones industrial average, says Jonathan Foster of Current Capital.
snippet: The recent financial crisis has heightened the need for fundamental changes in the Dow Jones industrial average, says Jonathan Foster of Current Capital.
lead_paragraph: The need to overhaul the Dow Jones industrial average has become even greater since the financial crisis hit, says Jonathan F. Foster, founder and managing director of the private equity firm Current Capital.

headline.main: Another View: It’s Time to Rebuild the Dow
